meanings.definition: The act or process of adding things together.
meanings.sent1: In math class, we practiced our summations by adding up all the numbers on the board.
meanings.sent2: The summations of the grocery bill showed us how much we spent on each item.
meanings.sent3: At the picnic, the ants made summations of all the crumbs they found.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a summation of all the joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The summations of the puzzle pieces finally revealed the hidden picture.

meanings.definition: The result of adding things together.
meanings.sent1: After hours of counting, the summations of the coins in the jar equaled ten dollars.
meanings.sent2: The summations of the votes showed a clear winner in the election.
meanings.sent3: The summations of the ingredients in the recipe created a delicious cake.
meanings.sent4: The laughter of the children was a summation of the happiness in the playground.
meanings.sent5: The summations of the colors in the painting made it come to life.
